name: Attack cockroach save the cake
description:
After the game starts
Will show a cake on the right side of the screen
From the left side of the screen, there will be continually running out
I will climb to the cake on the right.
Players need to click with the mouse cockroach
The clicked click will be destroyed
Successfully reaching the cake, it will consume the player's HP
When the player's HP is 0, the game is over.
Try to eliminate more embarrassment.


Method of operation

Use the mouse to click on the screen cockroach
